content: Google may have provided the dates 1964 to 1982 as the period during which Nelson Mandela was imprisoned because these were the years when he was held in the maximum-security prison on Robben Island. Mandela was arrested on August 5, 1962 and sentenced to life imprisonment for sabotage on June 12, 1964. He was released from prison on February 11, 1990, after serving 27 years. However,
